name: 6 (Mangoman)
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to the Game.

A short, narrative driven submission that simply asks you to roll a 6...

------------------------------------------------------

Unsurprisingly, the Web browser version has the odd visual glitch, so download the files for a smoother experience. 

------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Mouse 0 for next dialogue, or to skip dialogue, Mouse 1 or Space to roll the die. Escape to quit the game.

Made within 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 by a team of one.

Happy Jamming!
